title: The Best Weekend Sales, According To R29 Shopping Editors
description: As professional online shoppers, Refinery29 Most Wanted writers have a spidey sense for the best virtual sale sections and limited-time offers. Whether it's Lululemon's ol' reliable We Made Too Much sale or a flash deal on best-selling skin-care brands, where there's a clearance rack, there's an R29 shopping editor ready to size up its price-slashed goods. Today, we bring you the best sales happening this weekend. Gird your loins — err, wallets. The deals on this list must meet at least one of the following criteria: The discount is applied to a Refinery29 reader-favorite item (according to our anonymous shopping data), it takes a minimum of 20% off the full price, or it's an item that's rarely discounted, making even a slight price cut worth noting. The following sales are ones to watch and worthy of a spot in all budget-friendly carts — at least, in our opinion.All linked products are independently selected by our editors. If you purchase any of these products, we may earn a commission.For more can't-miss shopping stories delivered straight to your inbox, sign up for our Most Wanted newsletter.Labor Day IntroAs professional online shoppers, Refinery29 affiliate writers have a *spidey* sense for the best virtual sale sections and limited-time deals. Whether it's Lululemon's ol' reliable We Made Too Much sale or a flash deal on best-selling skin-care brands — where there's a clearance rack, there's an R29 shopping editor sizing up its price-slashed goods. And this weekend happens to be the Superbowl (i.e. Labor Day) for professional shoppers like ourselves. Time to gear up! While we know that you are probably inundated with sales galore on everything from clothing and beauty to home goods and mattresses, we have scanned through hundreds of sales to present to you the best sales happening this weekend, according to us.Regular intro As professional online shoppers, Refinery29 affiliate writers have a *spidey* sense for the best virtual sale sections and limited-time deals. Nordstrom

Shop Nordstrom

Shop Abercrombie & Fitch

We're total suckers for a Madewell deal. This weekend, score an extra 40% off sale items with the code LASTCHANCE. (For example, using this means you can snag this best-selling bag for only $65.70!)

Shop Madewell

6 of 38

Lululemon

Lululemon nails the trifecta of softness, style, and support, which is why we’re always lurking in its We Made Too Much section. Right now, we’ve got our eye on these pants — polished enough for work and comfy enough for a lunchtime stroll. 

Shop Lululemon

7 of 38

Ssense

From Ganni to Staud, Ssense’s designer sale is offering up to 70% off our favorite brands this weekend. It’s a goldmine of luxe pieces for your new year wardrobe — like these sweet Repetto ballet flats we can’t stop thinking about. (ICYMI, polka dot prints are back for 2025.)

Shop Ssense

Shop Free People

In the market for a new mattress? You're in luck — Avocado is taking up to $500 off some of its best-selling ones in a New Year sale.

Shop Avocado

Skims' sale section is always worth checking out. According to an on-site reviewer, these pants are “so light, soft, and airy that I can get that 'no-pants' feel” — and they're still available in several colorways and in sizes up to 4x. 

Shop Skims

11 of 38

LELO

Shop LELO

12 of 38

It’s dull and gray outside — but the Reformation sale is pure sunshine. Markdowns are now 50% off, with some pieces up to 70% off. We’re already dreaming of summer with this bold, bright number.

Shop Reformation

Shop Under Armour

What's better than clean beauty? Clean beauty on sale, obviously. Enter Credo’s winter sale, where you’ll find deals on makeup, skincare, body care, beauty tech, and fragrance. Plus, Credo backs its “clean beauty” claim with real transparency, carefully vetting brands for supply chain ethics, environmental impact, and more.

Shop Credo Beauty
